channel.title: GWD Doors?
channel.description:
How can I get the GWD doors to work? I'm using a PI Base and I fail at doors.cfg and all :/. This is my last bug and I can release my server! :D
Thanks!

item.title: GWD Doors?
item.dc:creator: @Gizcat Gizcat
item.description:
@Gizcat wrote:

Worked, had to do a little editing to that but Ima release a guide so people will understand it. would rep++

Read full topic

item.title: GWD Doors?
item.dc:creator: @Tylerd21 Tylerd21
item.description:
@Tylerd21 wrote:

Case number of the door, actionhandler.java
case ####;
movePlayer(####, ####, #);

(moveplayer is the method, the first four ####'s are the X coordinate, and the second set is the Y coordinate, the last “#” is the height)

Example,

case 2258: c.getPA().movePlayer(3013, 4833, 0); break;

or the firstclickNpc method in Actionhandler.java, ( in - game put a npc infront of the door) , then go back into actionhandler.java and do the same but with the NPC ID instead of the object. (Under the Firstclicknpc)

Example,

case 659: c.getPA().movePlayer(2738, 3476, 0); break;

Read full topic
